description.narrative: Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation, which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral Adolescent Development, Cross-Sectoral Early Childhood Development, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Research, Unicef Capacity For Programming On Gender. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards to achieve results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: The CPD 2022-2026 PSN was developed in consultation with staff, sections, other UN agencies, development partners and government agencies. The CPD package was submitted to the regional office for review. The Integrated Monitoring, Evaluation, Research and Study Plan for 2021 was monitored and updated regularly to ensure key evidence was generated in a timely manner. Evaluation management responses were followed up to inform the next CPD. | Status:Met | As-of Date:03/02/2022

actual.value: 2021:All evaluations planned for 2017-2021 were completed, except for the IECD evaluation which is on track.

title.narrative: Integrated Monitoring, Evaluation, Research and Study Plan reviewed and monitored quarterly; and updated and reported annually(50050), Text

actual.value: 2021:IMERSP 2017-2021 was fully updated based on monitoring and quality assurance

title.narrative: Timely update of SOP and guidance as well as tools on monitoring and evaluation provided to VCO staff.(50051), Text

baseline.value: new guidance and tools not developed

actual.value: 2021:relevant guidance and tools were timely developed and updated.
